document_title: What disease is anal itching? Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_name: ngua-hau-mon.json_2_Recognize the symptoms of anal itching
subsection_content:
Itching in the anus is easy to recognize by some typical symptoms as follows:(4)
Itching in anal area; Anal pain; Burning in anal area; Scratches appear on the anus; The skin around the anus is abnormally thickened; Anal itching occurs during defecation; Anal itching with genital itching; In some cases, anal itching is accompanied by blood.
subsection_title: ngua hau mon.json. Recognize the symptoms of anal itching
subsection_data:
